title: Red Season Rising
description: A feud between Gods.A nation besieged by armies of man, and demon.A man seeking redemption, and peace.Kalfinar is a grieving addict. Once a decorated and respected soldier, he has been demoted and disgraced.The relative peace of his half-life is shattered by the onset of chaos and war.Tormented by visions, he is marked for possession, and hunted by demons.Amidst the all-consuming ruin of a war between Gods, Kalfinar must lead the fight to defend a faith he has abandoned, and a nation that has disowned him.Red Season Rising is the debut novel of D.M. Murray and marks the beginning of a new epic fantasy series.
author: D.M.  Murray
